ing: 2 (3.25 ounce) cups Snack PackÂ® Chocolate Pudding
2 tablespoons Peter PanÂ® Creamy Peanut Butter
2 large ripe bananas, cut into pieces
des: "A smoothie recipe made with chocolate pudding, ripe bananas and creamy peanut butter for an indulgent treat."
ins:
Place all ingredients, except Reddi-wip, in blender container; blend until smooth.
Divide evenly among 4 glasses; top each with 1 serving Reddi-wip. Serve immediately.
